thread.title: Victoria's Secret Fashion Show books Rihanna, Selena Gomez, The Weeknd
thread.title_full: Victoria's Secret Fashion Show books Rihanna, Selena Gomez, The Weeknd

title: Victoria's Secret Fashion Show books Rihanna, Selena Gomez, The Weeknd
text:
The three performers at this year's VS Fashion Show. (Photo: CBS, USA TODAY, Getty)
16 CONNECT 16 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE After Taylor Swift and friends soundtracked last year's Victoria's Secret Fashion Show, the VS Angels will walk the runway to a different tune this year—courtesy of superstar performers Rihanna, Selena Gomez and the Weeknd.
The three performers were announced as the official musical guests for Victoria's Secret's 2015 show, which airs on Tuesday, Dec. 8 on CBS.
USA TODAY
Victoria's Secret Angels 'sexiest' fashion show returns to NY
The singers won't be the only big names on the catwalk—they'll be joined by the A-list models Adriana Lima, Alessandra Ambrosio, Behati Prinsloo, Candice Swanepoel and Lily Aldridge.
Expect Michael Jackson grooves from the Weeknd, sultry pop from Gomez, and from Rihanna, adventurous and sexy looks that'll rival anything the Angels wear that evening—and if we're lucky, some new music from the album she announced last week.
USA TODAY
9 things you missed at the Victoria's Secret fashion show
